QuestData.Title: Trapped!
QuestData.Description: <Hao struggles against the rubble with all his might.>$B$BHNNNGHHH!!$B$BLet me guess: my wife sent you? Imagine that, my delicate little snow lily all worried. Ha ha! She's always frettin' over me. Look--HNNGHH!!!--it'll take more than a little--HNNGGHHH!!--cave-in to keep ol' Hao down.$B$BSome o' the boys, on the other hand, are in trouble. Help 'em out if you find any, will ya? I'll be fine.$B$BReally.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 8 Greenstone Miners in the Greenstone Quarry.
QuestData.RewardText: <Hao lets out a hearty laugh.>$B$BI seen 'em come runnin' out o' there like ol' Kher Shan himself were givin' chase.
